Articles.Content:
i was playing ksp when i noticed that kerbal has no wildlife no life except them so i think it would be cool for a zoo

yes i know it would not add any gameplay but think a zoo in space wouldent that be amazing 

also it would be cool if tourists could come up

if you think this should not be here ok but thanks for reading this thread
